meanings.definition: A book size resulting from folding a sheet of paper into six leaves or twelve pages.
meanings.sent1: I found a small sixmo book at the library.
meanings.sent2: The sixmo was easy to carry around due to its compact size.
meanings.sent3: The tiny sixmo book got lost in the pile of larger books.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were neatly organized in her mind like a sixmo book.
meanings.sent5: The sixmo book fit perfectly in his pocket, making it convenient to read on the go.

meanings.sent1: She purchased a beautiful sixmo for her collection.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a variety of sixmos on display.
meanings.sent3: The sixmo looked like a miniature version of a regular book.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were packed tightly together like a sixmo.
meanings.sent5: The sixmo was so small that it could easily be hidden in a bag.
